titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to relieve a spouse or former spouse of liability for income tax for a taxable year if the divorce decree allocates such liability to the other spouse.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/11/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth a rule concerning allocation of tax liability under a divorce decree.
